long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add overlays to censor streaming videos on the internet. 

Want to show some movies to your kids or grandmas but can't because of inappropriate scenes? Well, now you can! Just cover the scenes with filters and mute strong languages with this extension.

Features
- blur specific areas at specific times
- mute or just lower the volume at specific times
- custom filter, write your own CSS code!
- supports web sites with HTML video element
- FREE with all features enabled
